document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2003-09
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE ClTY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING ZONING ORDINANCE AMENDMENT 2003-01 AMENDING THE ZONING MAP TO CHANGE THE DESIGNATION OF THE 14.41 ACRE PARCEL ON THE WEST SIDE OF BROADWAY TO THE NORTH OF THE SOUTHERN CITY LIMIT FROM OS (OPEN SPACE) TO P (PUBLIC), AND THE ACCEPTANCE OF AN ADDENDUM TO A NEGATIVE DECLARATION (APN 059-110-029)
